name: Deadly Choice
description:
Deadly Choice is a simple puzzle game, based on simple `number observation` choices.

The game plot (which is based on a well-known movie) starts with you waking up in an unknown room with bizarre-looking walls. You soon notice that the room has a number on the floor `357` and 3 doors. Your goal is to accumulate as many points as possible, by walking through different types of rooms, without dying.

Visit Game Website
